page.title: 08INTERESTING PEOPLE (Cont)
page.content: Mr. Bleasdale then went on to describe his working life in which he served industry in the trade of electrician. Having recently taken up retirement his interest has now turned to golf following on his active support in cricket and football, facilities for these sports being provided in both Askam and Ireleth with the nearby golf course of Dunnerholme providing all the requirements of the golfing fraternity resident and visitors.These particular golf links are popular not only because of the interesting round but also for the panoramic views of the Lake District Fells and the Duddon Estuary and Irish Sea. His interest is also in the Local Rugby Club which have good facilities. He does,however, regret the loss of the bowling green.
